text: {{Infobox writer | name = Dave Meltzer | image = Dave Meltzer 2018.jpg | imagesize = | caption = Meltzer in March 2018 | pseudonym = | birth_name = David Allen Meltzer | birth_date = | birth_place = New York City, New York, U.S. | death_date = | death_place = | occupation = Author, journalist, historian | alma_mater = San Jose State | period = 1971â€“present | genre = | subject = | movement = | notableworks = | spouse = | children = 2 | relatives = | awards = | signature = | website = | portaldisp = | ethnicity = }} Dave Meltzer (born in 1959) is a man who writes about professional wrestling for his magazine, and also on the Internet. Meltzer's website is called the Wrestling Observer. Before Meltzer, most writers wrote that professional wrestling was real, but Meltzer writes that it is not. He has also written two books called Tributes and Tributes II. == Related pages == * Wrestling Observer Newsletter awards ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people
title: Dave Meltzer
